name: Lisa
title: Witch of Purple Rose
intro: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

normalAttack.title: Lightning Touch
normalAttack.info:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 4 Electro attacks, dealing Electro DMG.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal Electro DMG after a short casting time.

Plunging Attack

Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skill.title: Violet Arc
skill.info:
Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away

Press

Releases a homing lightning orb. On hit, it deals Electro DMG, and applies a stack of the Conductive status (Max 3 stacks) to opponents in a small AoE.

Hold

After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby opponents.
Deals great amounts of extra damage to opponents based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them and clears their Conductive status.

burst.title: Lightning Rose
burst.info:
Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Electro DMG.

The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back opponents and deal Electro DMG for so long as it persists.

passiveTalents.title: Induced Aftershock
passiveTalents.info: Hits by Charged Attacks apply Violet Arc's Conductive status to opponents.

passiveTalents.title: Static Electricity Field
passiveTalents.info: Opponents hit by Lightning Rose have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

passiveTalents.title: General Pharmaceutics
passiveTalents.info: When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund one count of one material out of all the crafting materials used.
